Articles.Content:
As a kid I was very intrigued by space flight and the exploration of space. Of course, being a fan of space exploration, I had to watch Star Trek the Next Generation.

And then Stargate(The first movie) and Stargate SG-1 were made, and I was an instant fan. Though the real space exploration was a bit on the side line.

But a couple of weeks back, when NASA JPL released their 7 Minutes of Terror video for the Curiosity rover, I remembered why I like space exploration.

Then I remembered that Notch was making a space game(0x10c), looked around to see how far along the game was. Sadly not in playable form yet.

So I searched for "games like 0x10c", and I came across this top 10 list and it had Kerbal Space Program on it. Tried the demo and the next day, when I managed

to pry myself from the game, I bough it. I just don't have any words for how much I like the game, and I can't wait till the next update(0.17).

Welcome, Happy Launching

Arrr!

Hehe, beat ya to it Capt n'.

Hi The Stinger, welcome to the community

KSP is great isn't it? There's nothing else quite like it and it calls to our inner astronauts
